title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4038.3 - Conditions for starting claimed horse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4038.3 - Conditions for starting claimed horse

State Regulations

If a horse is claimed the horse shall not start in a
claiming race for a period of 20 days from the date of the claim for less than
25 percent more than the amount for which such horse was claimed. For a period
of 10 days thereafter, a horse is eligible to start for a claiming price equal
to or greater than the price at which the horse had been claimed. On the 31st
day, the horse may start in a claiming race for any price. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
